api.controllers

Class MailController

  • java.lang.Object
    • api.controllers.MailController

  • @RestController
public class MailController
extends java.lang.Object
    A REST Controller for endpoints relating to IMAP/SMTP connections and operations.
    Author:
    mattgogerly

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean deleteMessageFromFolder(java.lang.String account, java.lang.Long uid)
      Deletes a message with a given UID from the IMAP server.
      LocalResponse getLocal(java.lang.String account)
      Gets folders and messages store in the local database for a given Account.
      boolean getOlderMessages(java.lang.String account, java.lang.Long limit)
      Retrieves *limit* older messages (than we currently have stored locally) for each known folder from the server.

      Marks a message with a given UID as read.
      boolean sendMessage(java.lang.String account, NewMessageInfo info)
      Sends a message (extracted from NewMessageInfo) from a given Account.
      boolean syncWithServer(java.lang.String account)
      Retrieves any new messages from each folder and checks locally stored known messages for changes such as being marked as read or deleted.

    • Method Detail

      • getLocal

        @GetMapping(value="/imap/{account}")
public LocalResponse getLocal(@PathVariable(name="account")
                                                                    java.lang.String account)
        Gets folders and messages store in the local database for a given Account.
        Parameters:
        account - Id of the Account
        Returns:
        LocalResponse object containing known folders and messages for the Account

      • getOlderMessages

        @GetMapping(value="/imap/{account}/server/{limit}")
public boolean getOlderMessages(@PathVariable(name="account")
                                                                                     java.lang.String account,
                                                                                     @PathVariable(name="limit")
                                                                                     java.lang.Long limit)
        Retrieves *limit* older messages (than we currently have stored locally) for each known folder from the server.
        Parameters:
        account - Id of the Account
        limit - Number of messages to get as a maximum (some folders may have less)
        Returns:
        True if successful or false otherwise

      • syncWithServer

        @GetMapping(value="/imap/{account}/server")
public boolean syncWithServer(@PathVariable(name="account")
                                                                           java.lang.String account)
        Retrieves any new messages from each folder and checks locally stored known messages for changes such as being marked as read or deleted.
        Parameters:
        account - Id of the Account
        Returns:
        True if successful or false otherwise

      • deleteMessageFromFolder

        @DeleteMapping(value="/imap/{account}/{message}")
public boolean deleteMessageFromFolder(@PathVariable(name="account")
                                                                                          java.lang.String account,
                                                                                          @PathVariable(name="message")
                                                                                          java.lang.Long uid)
        Deletes a message with a given UID from the IMAP server.
        Parameters:
        account - Id of the Account
        uid - UID of the message
        Returns:
        True if successful or false otherwise

      • markMessageRead

        @PutMapping(value="/imap/{account}/{message}")
public boolean markMessageRead(@PathVariable(name="account")
                                                                               java.lang.String account,
                                                                               @PathVariable(name="message")
                                                                               java.lang.Long uid)
        Marks a message with a given UID as read.
        Parameters:
        account - Id of the Account
        uid - UID of the message
        Returns:
        True if successful or false otherwise

      • sendMessage

        @ResponseStatus(value=CREATED)
 @PostMapping(value="/smtp/{account}")
public boolean sendMessage(@PathVariable(name="account")
                                                                                                   java.lang.String account,
                                                                                                   @RequestBody
                                                                                                   NewMessageInfo info)
        Sends a message (extracted from NewMessageInfo) from a given Account.
        Parameters:
        account - Id of the Account
        info - NewMessageInfo object containing information necessary to send an email
        Returns:
        True if successful or false otherwise
